title: Why MVS is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authroization means being allows to access the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It has really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!
